title: Series ended for inactivity during ban pick is bs
body: Really frustrated when I lose my series by lagging during ban & pick phase. Absolute unfair and waste of time. Why is there no protection against a sudden high ping in the client instead of punishing players who did nothing wrong?

replies.body:
Because it's very easy to spoof internet issues and to offer such protection would see it very quickly abused.

For genuine connection issues, it shouldn't be happening very often, so shouldn't be much of a concern.
If the issues are consistent, you probably shouldn't be playing ranked to begin with.
Allowing extra time sounds all well and good, but then what's the point of a timer at all, and where's the assurance you won't be lagging in game as well?
